languages.text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник под действием стратагемы: укрепление должен получить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g}, вместо этого он получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Every time allies under the effect of Stronghold Stratagem should have suffered an injury, they gain +(INT+FEL bonus) temporary wounds instead.
Every time allies under the effect of Stronghold Stratagem should have suffered an injury, they gain +(INT + FEL bonus) temporary wounds instead.

Every time allies under the effect of Stronghold Stratagem should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

Every time allies under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Stronghold {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

Every time allies under the effect of Stronghold Stratagem should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

languages.text: Когда союзник под действием {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}стратагемы: укрепление{/g} должен получить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g}, вместо этого он получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник под действием {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}стратагемы: укрепление{/g} должен получить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g}, вместо этого он получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Когда союзник под действием стратагемы: укрепление должен получить ранение, вместо этого он получает +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ) временного здоровья.
Когда союзник под действием стратагемы: укрепление должен получить ранение, вместо этого он получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} временного здоровья.

languages.text: 每当受到{g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}据点策略{/g}影响的盟友受到攻击产生{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}时，该盟友不会受到伤势影响，而会获得{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: 每当受到据点策略影响的盟友受到攻击产生{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}时，该盟友不会受到伤势影响，而会获得{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
每当受到据点策略影响的盟友受到攻击产生伤势时，该盟友不会受到伤势影响，而会获得{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que los aliados que estén bajo los efectos de {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Estratagema de fortificación{/g} deban sufrir una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g}, en vez de eso ganan +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que los aliados que estén bajo los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Estratagema de fortificación{/g} deban sufrir una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g}, en vez de eso ganan +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

Cada vez que los aliados que estén bajo los efectos de Estratagema de fortificación deban sufrir una lesión, en vez de eso ganan +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: Jedes Mal, wenn Verbündete, auf die gerade der Effekt des {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stützpunkt-Strategems{/g} wirkt, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erleiden sollten, erhalten sie stattdessen +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn Verbündete, auf die gerade der Effekt des Stützpunkt-{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} wirkt, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erleiden sollten, erlangen sie stattdessen +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

Jedes Mal, wenn Verbündete, auf die gerade der Effekt des Stützpunkt-Strategems wirkt, eine Verletzung erleiden sollten, erlangen sie stattdessen +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Plutôt que de subir une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g}, les alliés sous l'effet du {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}stratagème Bastion{/g} bénéficient de +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: Plutôt que de subir une blessure, les alliés sous l'effet du Stratagème Bastion bénéficient de +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

Plutôt que de subir une blessure, les alliés sous l'effet du Stratagème Bastion bénéficient de +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: 要塞計略の効果を受けている味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を負うたびに、代わりに+{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of Stronghold Stratagem should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text: 要塞計略の効果を受けている味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を負うたびに、代わりに+{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。
城塞計略の効果を受けている味方が負傷を負うたびに、代わりに+{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Müstahkem Savaş Hilesi{/g}'nin etkisi altındaki dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlığa{/g} maruz kaldıklarında bunun yerine +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanırlar.
languages.original_text: Every time allies under the effect of {g|f:631bcfc164274b6382daace38b7ce951}Stronghold Stratagem{/g} should have suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, they gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|bb601b2b4d404a219b33426afcf1d783} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} instead.
